item.title: [SEAMECLTD] Seamec Ltd's Vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA' Returns to Field After Technical Redressal
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Seamec Ltd has announced the return of its vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA' to the field following technical redressal. The vessel was off-hire and undergoing repairs, but it has now resumed operations as of 16 January 2026 at 22:00 hours.

  • Seamec Ltd's vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA' has returned to the field after technical redressal.
  • The vessel was off-hire and undergoing repairs.
  • It has resumed operations as of 16 January 2026 at 22:00 hours.
  • The return of the vessel to operations is a significant development for Seamec Ltd.

Company: SEAMEC LTD. | Category: Deals

item.title: [SEAMECLTD] Seamec Ltd's Vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA' Returns to Field After Technical Redressal
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Seamec Ltd has informed about the deployment status of its vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA'. Following technical redressal, the vessel has returned to the field and has been on hire since 16 January 2026, 22:00 hours. The information was received on 17 January 2026, at 00:27 hours.

  • Seamec Ltd's vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA' has returned to the field after technical redressal.
  • The vessel has been on hire since 16 January 2026, 22:00 hours.

item.title: [PBAINFRA] PBA Infrastructure Ltd. to Appoint Suresh Kumar Sunderlal Bothra as Managing Director for 2 Years
item.description:
PBA Infrastructure Ltd. has scheduled an Extra-Ordinary General Meeting (EGM) on 12th February 2026 at 4.00 p.m. through Video Conferencing and Other Audio Visual Means. The EGM will transact the special business of appointing Suresh Kumar Sunderlal Bothra as Managing Director for a term of 2 years.

  • PBA Infrastructure Ltd. has called for an Extra-Ordinary General Meeting (EGM)
  • The EGM will be held on 12th February 2026 at 4.00 p.m.
  • The EGM will be conducted through Video Conferencing and Other Audio Visual Means
  • Suresh Kumar Sunderlal Bothra is proposed to be appointed as Managing Director for a term of 2 years
  • The appointment is subject to the approval of the Members of the Company

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: PBA INFRASTRUCTURE LTD. | Category: Board Meeting

item.title: [POWERGRID] POWERGRID Bhadla Sikar Transmission Limited Commissions 8.1GW Solar Energy Transmission Project
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

POWERGRID Bhadla Sikar Transmission Limited, a Wholly Owned Subsidiary of Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd., has successfully commissioned a transmission system strengthening scheme for evacuation of Power from Solar energy Zones in Rajasthan under Phase II â€” Part E. The project, secured through Tariff Based Competitive Bidding, has a capacity of 8.1GW. The project received the Notification for Commercial Operation (DOCO) via email on 16th January, 2026.

  • POWERGRID Bhadla Sikar Transmission Limited has commissioned an 8.1GW solar energy transmission project in Rajasthan.
  • The project was secured through Tariff Based Competitive Bidding.
  • The project is a part of the transmission system strengthening scheme under Phase II â€” Part E.
  • The project received the Notification for Commercial Operation (DOCO) via email on 16th January, 2026.

item.title: [VICTMILL] Victoria Mills Ltd Schedules Board Meeting to Approve Q4 Results for 2025
item.description:
Victoria Mills Ltd has announced a board meeting scheduled for February 13, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended December 31, 2025. This meeting is in accordance with Regulation 29 and other applicable regulations of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

  • Victoria Mills Ltd has scheduled a board meeting on February 13, 2026
  • The meeting aims to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for Q4 2025
  • This meeting is in compliance with SEBI regulations

Company: VICTORIA MILLS LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [AEQUS] Aequs Ltd Enters Joint Venture with Accel India VIII, Vagus Defence Tech & Aerospace Fund I, and Ajna Aerospace & Defence
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Aequs Limited has executed a Joint Venture Agreement and Shareholders Agreement with Accel India VIII (Mauritius) Ltd, Vagus Defence Tech & Aerospace Fund I, and Ajna Aerospace & Defence Private Limited. The joint venture aims to source, acquire, license intellectual property rights for unmanned aerial vehicles from overseas licensors and owners, develop and manufacture, assemble, test, market and sell unmanned aerial vehicles ('UAVs') and related products in India and internationally. Aequs, Accel and Vagus will have equal shareholding in the JV Company and will have special rights such as right to appoint directors, first right of refusal, and right of first offer in case of issuance of shares. This is not a related party transaction.

  • Aequs Ltd enters into a joint venture with Accel India VIII (Mauritius) Ltd, Vagus Defence Tech & Aerospace Fund I, and Ajna Aerospace & Defence Private Limited
  • The joint venture aims to source, acquire, license intellectual property rights for unmanned aerial vehicles from overseas licensors and owners
  • Aequs, Accel and Vagus will have equal shareholding in the JV Company
  • Special rights such as right to appoint directors, first right of refusal, and right of first offer in case of issuance of shares
  • This is not a related party transaction

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Aequs Ltd | Category: Joint Ventures

item.title: [DALBHARAT] Dalmia Bharat Ltd Disposes Entire Stake in Associate O2 Renewable Energy V Private Limited
item.category: Disposal of stake in an Associate
item.description:
Dalmia Bharat Ltd announced that its wholly owned subsidiary, Dalmia Cement (Bharat) Limited (DCBL), has disposed of the entire 25.44% equity stake in O2 Renewable Energy V Private Limited (OREV). OREV was an associate of DCBL, but since DCBL did not exercise any control over OREV, its financials were not consolidated with the financials of the Company. The stake was transferred to third parties, namely SW Neo Energy Limited, Goldman Sachs Services Pvt Ltd, and Syngene International Limited, for a consideration of Rs. 10.82 Crore. The disposal was completed on January 16, 2026.

  • Dalmia Bharat Ltd's subsidiary, Dalmia Cement (Bharat) Limited, disposes of entire 25.44% stake in O2 Renewable Energy V Private Limited
  • O2 Renewable Energy V Private Limited was an associate of Dalmia Cement (Bharat) Limited, but its financials were not consolidated with the Company's financials
  • The stake was transferred to third parties for a consideration of Rs. 10.82 Crore
  • The disposal was completed on January 16, 2026
  • The transaction does not fall under related party transactions and is not covered by any Scheme of Arrangement

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Dalmia Bharat Ltd | Category: Disposal of stake in an Associate

item.title: [SAILANI] Sailani Tours N Travels Ltd Announces No Deviation in Public Issue Proceeds Use
item.description:
Sailani Tours N Travels Ltd has announced that there has been no deviation or variation in the use of the Public Issue Proceeds raised from the Initial Public Issue (IPO). This information is for the record.

item.title: [NH] Narayana Hrudayalaya Ltd Incorporates Wholly Owned Subsidiary 'Narayana Healthcare North Private Limited'
item.description:
Narayana Hrudayalaya Ltd, a leading healthcare service provider, has incorporated a Wholly Owned Subsidiary named 'Narayana Healthcare North Private Limited' on January 16, 2026. The new subsidiary, with a paid-up capital of Rs. 5,00,000, is aimed at optimizing the company's presence in the Northern part of the country and carrying on the business of healthcare services in the field of hospitals, health, and wellness management.

  • Narayana Hrudayalaya Ltd has incorporated a Wholly Owned Subsidiary named 'Narayana Healthcare North Private Limited'
  • The new subsidiary is registered under the Companies Act, 2013 with CIN: U86100KA2026PTC214296
  • The subsidiary is authorized with a capital of Rs. 10,00,000 and a paid-up capital of Rs. 5,00,000
  • The new subsidiary is aimed at optimizing the company's presence in the Northern part of the country
  • The subsidiary's main object is to operate and run hospitals and to provide healthcare services in the field of health and wellness management

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Narayana Hrudayalaya Ltd | Category: New Launch
